title: Astranis adds extra year of life to small GEO satellite design
summary: Improvements Astranis has made to the propulsion systems of four small satellites slated to launch in 2023 will add at least another year to their operational lives, according to CEO John Gedmark.

title: Defense Intelligence Agency calls attention to China’s and Russia’s growing presence in space
summary: A new report by the Defense Intelligence Agency notes that the space fleets of China and Russia grew more than 70% in just over two years.

title: NASA, UAE Mars Missions Agree to Share Science Data
summary: NASA’s MAVEN mission and the United Arab Emirates’ Hope Probe mission are paving the way toward greater scientific collaboration and data exchange between the two Mars orbiters.

title: NASA to restart fueling test of SLS rocket, with key modifications
summary: "We’re very comfortable with the path forward."

title: US, India agree to cooperate on space situational awareness
summary: The United States and India have agreed to cooperate on space situational awareness, a deal that the U.S. Department of Defense said would “lay the groundwork for more advanced cooperation in space.”
